title: F1 Fantasy Optimizer [Building...]
description: Developing a fantasy Formula One optimizer by scraping historical race and weather data, training models to predict driver performance, and deploying a full-stack app for fantasy lineup recommendations
tech: Python, XGBoost, Optuna, Next.js, Firebase, RESTful API

title: CWRU Course Notification System [Building...]
description: Designing a real-time monitoring system to alert students of seat availability changes during peak registration periods
tech: React, MongoDB, Nodejs, TailwindCSS, SendGrid Email RESTful API

title: BayBai
description: Baybai is a mobile app that teaches and revives Baybayin, the pre-colonial Filipino script. It features flashcards, a translator, and a social space for collaborative learning.

title: Club Hub
description: A full-stack app to manage student-led clubs, track attendance, events, and inventory.

title: Research on EEG signal denoising algorithms
description: How does a stochastic algorithm compare to a deterministic iterative algorithm in removing artifacts in simulated EEG time series data?

title: Truth or Truth
description: A webapp that encourages meaningful conversations through curated question decks.
